articles.title: The 3 Hottest ETFs to Buy Right Now
articles.summary: This article highlights three top-performing ETFs for investors: the Invesco S&P 500 Top 50 ETF (XLG), the iShares Semiconductor ETF (SOXX), and the Vanguard Information Technology ETF (VGT). It details their holdings, expense ratios, and strong historical performance compared to the broader market, making a case for their inclusion in a long-term investment portfolio.

articles.title: Getty Images Reports Third Quarter 2023 Results
articles.summary: Getty Images reported its financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2023, noting a slight revenue decline but strong growth in annual subscribers, particularly in e-commerce. The company also highlighted the launch of its generative AI service in partnership with NVIDIA, which aims to provide commercially safe and indemnified content. Despite challenging market conditions and warrant litigation impacts, Getty Images maintained a strong Adjusted EBITDA margin and revised its full-year 2023 guidance.

articles.title: 10월 하락장 맞춘 AI ETF…엔비디아보다 '이것' 담았다 [글로벌마켓나우 플러스]
articles.summary: LG AI연구원과 인공지능 전문 자산운용사 크래프트 테크놀로지스가 협력하여 'LG 크래프트 AI 파워드 US 라지캡 코어 상장지수펀드'(LQAI ETF)를 뉴욕증권거래소에 상장했습니다. 이 ETF는 엔비디아보다 구글과 마이크로소프트 비중을 높이고, 크래프트 테크놀로지스의 AI 위험 예측 지표를 통해 10월 하락장과 11월 초 반등을 예측하는 정확도를 보였습니다. 내년 시장 전망에서는 넷플릭스를 최선호 종목으로 꼽고, 기술주와 헬스케어 비중을 높이며 부동산 섹터는 편입하지 않고 있습니다.

articles.title: Amdocs and NVIDIA to Accelerate Adoption of Generative AI for $1.7 Trillion Telecom Industry
articles.summary: Amdocs and NVIDIA announced a collaboration to optimize large language models (LLMs) to accelerate the adoption of generative AI applications and services across the $1.7 trillion telecommunications and media industries. This partnership will see Amdocs customize enterprise-grade LLMs on NVIDIA accelerated computing, leveraging NVIDIA DGX Cloud AI supercomputing and NVIDIA AI Enterprise software within the Amdocs amAIz framework. The initiative aims to enable communications service providers to efficiently deploy generative AI for customer experiences, network provisioning, and other operational enhancements, building on Amdocs' existing partnership with Microsoft.

articles.title: AMD Is Powering the New Steam Machine. Will It Move the Needle for AMD Stock?
articles.summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) will power Valve's new Steam Machine with its RDNA 3 GPU and Zen 4 CPU, a development that reinforces AMD's reputation as an innovator and aids in brand visibility and diversification, despite being unlikely to significantly impact AMD stock revenue immediately. The article discusses AMD's strong Q3 earnings, high valuation multiples compared to competitors like Nvidia, Qualcomm, and Texas Instruments, and analyst price targets. While AI dominates current chipmaker focus, the gaming industry remains crucial, showcasing AMD's continued innovation in the sector.

articles.title: Amdocs to create telco-specific GenAI models using Nvidia service
articles.summary: Amdocs will utilize Nvidia's AI foundry service to develop custom large language models (LLMs) specifically for the global telecommunications industry. This collaboration aims to provide telcos with enhanced performance and optimized resource utilization through specialized GenAI capabilities, building on a prior partnership between Amdocs and Microsoft. The development emphasizes the growing industry need for tailored AI solutions to address sector-specific challenges, as highlighted by other major telecom players developing their own GenAI models.

articles.title: FMR LLC Acquires New Stake in Magenta Therapeutics Inc
articles.summary: FMR LLC, through its flagship company Fidelity Investments, has acquired a new stake in Magenta Therapeutics Inc (MGTA) by purchasing 2,218,212 shares at $0.6996 per share. This transaction gives FMR LLC a 14.97% ownership stake in the clinical-stage biotechnology company, indicating a strategic investment aligning with the firm's focus on technology and healthcare sectors. Despite Magenta Therapeutics currently operating at a loss, FMR LLC's move suggests a belief in the company's long-term value and transformative potential in stem cell and gene therapy.

articles.title: After Earnings, Is AMD Stock a Buy, a Sell, or Fairly Valued?
articles.summary: Morningstar assesses AMD's stock post-Q3 earnings, evaluating its fair value, economic moat, and future prospects, particularly in the AI accelerator market. The company's target of over $2 billion in AI accelerator revenue for 2024 positions it as a significant player. While fair value is estimated at $125 per share, high uncertainty exists due to competition from Nvidia and potential shifts in the x86 architecture dominance.

articles.title: Cisco taps ex-Microsoft executive Rodney Clark to lead partner network
articles.summary: Cisco Systems Inc. has appointed Rodney Clark, a former Microsoft executive, as its new senior vice president for Partnerships and Small & Medium Business. Clark will be responsible for leading Cisco's global partner network. His appointment was announced on November 6, 2023.

articles.title: Investing in Semiconductor ETFs & Stocks
articles.summary: This article explores investing in semiconductor ETFs and stocks, detailing the sector's evolution, market dynamics, and future outlook, especially concerning AI. It highlights semiconductors' crucial role in modern technology, the economic powerhouse of the industry, and the benefits of investing via ETFs for diversification and accessibility. The piece also discusses factors influencing the sector, including geopolitical efforts to secure supply chains and the profound impact of AI on semiconductor demand and innovation.

articles.title: Sudden release of the Nvidia H200: double the capacity, the bandwidth is booming
articles.summary: NVIDIA has unexpectedly released the HGX H200, an advanced Tensor Core GPU based on the Hopper architecture, boasting significantly increased memory capacity and bandwidth for AI and HPC workloads. The H200, featuring HBM3e memory, doubles capacity and offers 2.4 times the bandwidth of its predecessor, the A100. It also claims a 2x inference speed increase over the H100 GPU for LLMs and will be deployed by major cloud service providers and used in the new Jupiter supercomputer.

articles.title: 3 undervalued artificial intelligence stocks
articles.summary: This article identifies three undervalued artificial intelligence stocks—Snowflake, Cognizant Technology Solutions, and Salesforce—according to Morningstar analysts, while also highlighting dominant but fairly valued AI players like Nvidia and Microsoft. It emphasizes the significant impact of generative AI and offers insights into how investors can approach the AI boom by breaking down the space into various themes and subthemes with representative companies. The piece also notes the strong rally in AI stocks following ChatGPT's release and details the economic moats and fair value estimates for the featured companies.
